metadata.title: All about tool palettes with Ryan Wunderlich
metadata.description:
IMAGINiT expert Ryan Wunderlich shares some of his favorite AutoCAD Tips & Tricks when working with tool palettes. 
• What is a Tool Palette
•  What can you put into it
• Customizing & Creating
• Sharing Tool Palettes
